channel.title: I Get Error When Starting Up RSPS Server |Centos|
channel.description:
I Get Error When Starting Up RSPS Server |Centos|
[root@rsps PVP 317 X Source]# sh run run: line 3: cd: bin: No such file or directory
RUN.SH #!/bin/bash
cd bin && java -Xmx1024M server Any Suggestions?
SPECS
Disk Space: 10GB Monthly Bandwidth: 500GB Guaranteed RAM: 256MB Burstable RAM: 512MB
